content: You are Antonio. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Agnese., Agnese just said to you: '"Grazie, Antonio! That was…smooth. Appreciate you handling that."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Agnese. Glad it went well. You're most welcome!"
